mapper.select: select u.user_name as userName u.user_password as userPassword from user u where u.user_name=#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into user( user_name, user_password, user_gender, user_phoneNumber, user_email, user_address, user_tips, user_group, createtime ) values( #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPassword,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userGender,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhoneNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userTips,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
